sense.def:
Kadar tekočina ali plamen
spouts out of something
, iz nečesa pride hitro in v dolgem toku.

seg.quote: ...jets of water spouting up from the basins below.
Their tanks came on in hordes, spouting flames.

sense.def:
To spout something
pomeni brez prestanka ali premisleka govoriti o nečem, kar smo izvedeli.

seg.quote: You were always spouting some theory to us.

sense.def:
The spout of a kettle or teapot
je cev kotlička ali čajnika, iz katere priteče tekočina.
